title: Keep Disconnecting from PvP.Net
body: I need help fixing my league client, everytime i don't move around on the client i always disconnect from PvP.net. I have already tried disabling ip helper and it still doesn't work

replies.body: The game requires a constant connection to communicate everything that's going on, so a weak network can cause you to have delays and disconnections.  As Rineyy suggested, following our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should get you squared away.  Let me know if you have any questions!
